name: New Webnovel Light - PrivateBin Sites
description:
Makes PrivateBin sites display similar to webnovel. Light Format.

Based on BlackYam's work https://userstyles.org/users/629603
additional_info:
Sites include:
https://paste.imirhil.fr/
https://paste.jaegers.net/
https://paste.tech-port.de/
https://pastebin.grey.pw/
https://priv.atebin.com/
https://vim.cx/

Uncomment the font import on the first line ONLY if you understand the risks.
